mapper.insert: /* insertOfferTitleTrans */ INSERT INTO TRANSLATION_TB (TRANS_NO, TRANS_EN, TRANS_S_CN, TRANS_T_CN) VALUES (#{offerTitleTransNo}, #{offerTitleEn}, #{offerTitleSc}, #{offerTitleTc})
/* insertOfferAuthInfoTrans */ INSERT INTO TRANSLATION_TB (TRANS_NO, TRANS_EN, TRANS_S_CN, TRANS_T_CN) VALUES (#{offerAuthInfoTransNo}, #{offerAuthInfoEn}, #{offerAuthInfoSc}, #{offerAuthInfoTc})

/* insertNewOffer */ INSERT INTO CHALLENGE_OFFER_TB (offer_no, offer_title_t_no, offer_auth_info_t_no, offer_st_cd, offer_start_dt) VALUES (#{offerNo}, #{offerTitleTransNo}, #{offerAuthInfoTransNo}, 'VO02', CURDATE()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE offer_title_t_no = #{offerTitleTransNo}, offer_auth_info_t_no = #{offerAuthInfoTransNo}, offer_st_cd = 'VO02', offer_start_dt = CURDATE()
mapper.select: /* selectOfferDetail */ SELECT cot.offer_no offerNo, (CASE WHEN ut.user_id IS NOT NULL THEN ut.user_id ELSE 'admin' END) userId , (CASE WHEN ut.user_nickname IS NOT NULL THEN ut.user_nickname ELSE 'admin' END) nickName , cot.offer_title offerTitle, cot.offer_auth_info offerAuthInfo , (SELECT trans_en FROM TRANSLATION_TB WHERE trans_no = cot.offer_title_t_no) offerTitleEn , (SELECT trans_t_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB WHERE trans_no = cot.offer_title_t_no) offerTitleTc , (SELECT trans_s_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB WHERE trans_no = cot.offer_title_t_no) offerTitleSc , (SELECT trans_en FROM TRANSLATION_TB WHERE trans_no = cot.offer_auth_info_t_no) offerAuthInfoEn , (SELECT trans_t_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB WHERE trans_no = cot.offer_auth_info_t_no) offerAuthInfoTc , (SELECT trans_s_cn FROM TRANSLATION_TB WHERE trans_no = cot.offer_auth_info_t_no) offerAuthInfoSc , cot.offer_st_cd offerStatusCd, cot.offer_like_num offerLikeNum FROM CHALLENGE_OFFER_TB cot LEFT JOIN USER_TB ut ON cot.offer_user_no = ut.user_no WHERE cot.offer_no = #{offerNo}
